page.title: 05Farming survey by pupils
page.content: The children decided that the area we had been allocated comprises farms and woodland. Our next task was to find out what was happening on these farms and to do this we asked the farmers to complete a questionnaire we devised. We soon received replies and invitations to see the farms for ourselves. We soon found out that Cadbury Farm is a private house and office for a property developer but the land and Spearywell Farm is owned by the National Trust and farmed in conjunction with Hatt Farm. School Farm house is a private house and the farm buildings are south of our area. Lockerley Water farmhouse is a private house and the land owned and used by a neighbouring farmer for sheep. His farm is out of our area. Mill Farm was sold by the Dalgety estate (Lockerley Hall) & is derelict.
